sendEmail(String, Date, String, String, ArrayList) - Method in class Business.EmailManager
use synchronization , to allow multiple registration and load balancing get the sender details and attach it to the sender variable, it also stands as storage for all email sent by the specific sender If the specified key is not already associated with a value (or is mapped to null), attempts to compute its value using the given mapping function and enters it into this map unless null.
